description: Police said they believed that Nyah Mway brandished a weapon after running away from three officers who were investigating a string of recent robberies. Authorities later said it was a pellet gun.
title: What we know about the fatal police shooting of a 13-year-old boy in Utica, N.Y

description: A memo obtained by NPR says the campaign wants a streamlined platform to keep a focused message. In an attempt to tamp down controversy, they also plan to sort the language behind closed doors.
title: Trump team plans to pare down Republican Party platform ahead of convention

description: Ernesto's mom gives him a quarter every morning. "For emergencies," she says. "If you need me, look for a pay phone." Hey, it was the '90s! But how will Ernesto spend his Emergency Quarters?
title: 'Emergency Quarters' are for pay phones (remember those?) in a new book by ‘90s kids
